com.vividsolutions.jts.noding
Class Octant

java.lang.Object
  com.vividsolutions.jts.noding.Octant

public class Octant
extends java.lang.Object

Methods for computing and working with octants of the Cartesian plane Octants are numbered as follows: 

  \2|1/
 3 \|/ 0
 ---+--
 4 /|\ 7
  /5|6\
 
 If line segments lie along a coordinate axis, the octant is the lower of the two
 possible values.








Version:

  
1.7

















Method Summary





static int
octant(Coordinate p0,
       Coordinate p1)



          Returns the octant of a directed line segment from p0 to p1.		





static int
octant(double dx,
       double dy)



          Returns the octant of a directed line segment (specified as x and y
 displacements, which cannot both be 0).

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
